name: Tanker_Melee.Stone_Melee
display_help: You can use the powers of earth and stone to do battle with your foes. Stone Melee allows you to strike with fists of stone, summon earthen weapons, and even quake the very ground itself.

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Stone_Melee.Stone_Fist
powers.display_help: Your stone covered fists attack swiftly for moderate damage, and may Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Melee Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient,

display_info: 10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 9.54s on target
10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Stone_Melee.Stone_Mallet
powers.display_help: Your control over the earth allows you to form a mallet of solid stone. This Stone Mallet deals heavy damage, and can knock down weak foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 50.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Stone_Melee.Heavy_Mallet
powers.display_help: A more impressive form of Stone Mallet, the Heavy Mallet deals more damage, but is slower to swing. It has a greater chance of knocking down opponents. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 75.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
75.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Stone_Melee.Taunt
powers.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -100.00% strength to range for 20s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Stone_Melee.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Stone_Melee.Fault
powers.display_help: This powerful stomp can cause a seismic disturbance. This will crack the Earth itself and send a Fault towards a targeted foe, throwing him and nearby enemies into the air and possibly Disorienting them. Fault deals no damage on its own. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 50.00% chance for 1.0 stun for 9.54s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Stone_Melee.Tremor
powers.display_help: You can cause a localized earthquake immediately around you. This will deal moderate damage to every foe in melee range, while knocking them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 80.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
80.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Stone_Melee.Hurl_Boulder
powers.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack deals high damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 50.00% chance for 7.8 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 7.8 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Stone_Melee.Seismic_Smash
powers.display_help: This massive attack hits with all the force of the Earth itself. It deals tremendous amounts of damage, and may Hold the target if they are not defeated outright. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
